page.title: 03CHURCHES
page.content: THERE ARE SEVERAL CHURCHES IN OUR AREA. ST.AIDAN'S AND ST.NINIAN'S ARE BOTH CHURCH OF SCOTLAND WHICH IS OUR NATIONAL CHURCH. ST. NINIAN'S HAS A MEMBERSHIP ROLL OF 1200 AND ST. AIDAN'S IS SLIGHTLY SMALLER WITH 1009.THE ONLY CATHOLIC CHURCH IS CALLED OUR LADY AND ST. ANDREW WITH A ROLL OF 750. THESE THREE BUILDINGS ARE ALL MADE OF SOLID STONE, TWO OF WHICH HAVE SPIRES. IT IS INTERESTING TO NOTE THAT THERE ARE NO CHURCHES IN THE TOWN WITH TOWERS.NAMES OF VERY IMPORTANT SCOTTISH SAINTS HAVE BEEN GIVEN TO THESE THREE CHURCHES. ALSO IN THIS AREA ARE THREE SMALLER CHURCHES - BAPTIST (150 MEMBERS),CONGREGATIONAL (140 MEMBERS),APOSTOLIC(75 MEMBERS).
